aboutDisclaimer: Nothing on this website is legal advice. Always review agreements under local law.
aboutHumanConnection: This single act of generosity revealed what modern travel platforms have sacrificed: authentic human empathy and personal trust. That moment became our foundation‚Äîa commitment to relationships built on openness, respect, and shared humanity.
aboutInvitation: Join our community and share your seasonal journey. Help someone feel welcomed and understood in ways no algorithm can replicate.
aboutMission: Seasoners connects people across borders to live, work, and grow together through meaningful cultural exchange. We believe accommodation should transcend transactions‚Äîcreating opportunities for genuine human connection and mutual understanding.
aboutText1: Seasoners helps travelers and hosts connect for short-term stays and seasonal work.
aboutText2: We keep agreements simple and direct ‚Äî helping you live and work around the world.
aboutWhyItMatters: In an era of algorithmic matching and impersonal transactions, we're rebuilding a bridge between travelers, hosts, and seasonal employers‚Äîone founded on transparency, fairness, and cultural respect. Every interaction on Seasoners is an opportunity to forge meaningful connections that transcend borders.
afterRegistration: After registration, you will need to:
agreementDisclaimer: Template only ‚Äî not legal advice. Review locally before signing.
agreementPreamble: This agreement is designed to help travelers and hosts build trust from day one. It‚Äôs written in plain language so both parties know what‚Äôs expected ‚Äî and what‚Äôs fair. By signing, both sides commit to clear communication, honesty, and respect throughout the stay.
agreementPreambleDe: Diese Vereinbarung soll Reisenden und Gastgebern helfen, von Anfang an Vertrauen aufzubauen. Sie ist in einfacher Sprache verfasst, damit beide Parteien wissen, was erwartet wird ‚Äì und was fair ist. Mit der Unterzeichnung verpflichten sich beide Seiten zu klarer Kommunikation, Ehrlichkeit und Respekt w√§hrend des gesamten Aufenthalts.
agreementPreambleEn: This agreement is designed to help travelers and hosts build trust from day one. It's written in plain language so both parties know what's expected ‚Äî and what's fair. By signing, both sides commit to clear communication, honesty, and respect throughout the stay.
agreementTemplate: Rental Agreement between [Tenant] and [Landlord] for [Address] from [Start] to [End]. Monthly rent ‚Ç¨[Amount].
agreementTemplateDe: Mietvertrag: [Vollst√§ndiger Name des Mieters] mietet von [Vollst√§ndiger Name des Vermieters] die Immobilie unter [Vollst√§ndige Adresse] vom [Startdatum] bis [Enddatum]. Monatliche Miete: ‚Ç¨[Betrag], f√§llig am [F√§lligkeitstag] √ºber [Zahlungsmethode]. Enthaltene Nebenkosten: [Liste]. Kaution: ‚Ç¨[Kaution] (falls zutreffend). K√ºndigungsfrist: [AnzahlTage] Tage. Beide Parteien stimmen den oben genannten Smart Stay Agreement-Klauseln zu.
agreementTemplateEn: Rental Agreement: [Tenant Full Name] rents from [Landlord Full Name] the property at [Full Address] from [Start Date] to [End Date]. Monthly rent: ‚Ç¨[Amount], due [DueDay] via [Payment Method]. Utilities included: [List]. Security deposit: ‚Ç¨[Deposit] (if applicable). Notice period: [NoticeDays] days. Both parties agree to the Smart Stay Agreement clauses above.
allVerificationsComplete: Verification complete! You now have full access to all platform features.
areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete this listing?
checkEmailVerification: We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and follow the link.
checkInboxForVerification: Check your inbox for a verification link. Didn't receive it?
checkSpam: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
clauseBasics: Address, dates, rent amount, included utilities, and any furnishings. Both parties confirm the space is suitable and respectfully maintained.
clauseBasicsDe: Beide Parteien best√§tigen die Mietadresse, Aufenthaltsdaten, monatliche Miete, enthaltene Nebenkosten (Strom, Wasser, Internet) und bereitgestellte M√∂bel. Der Mieter verpflichtet sich, den Raum respektvoll zu pflegen und Probleme umgehend zu melden. Der Gastgeber best√§tigt, dass die Immobilie sicher, bewohnbar und wie beschrieben ist.
clauseBasicsEn: Both parties confirm the rental address, stay dates, monthly rent amount, utilities included (electricity, water, internet), and furnishings provided. The tenant agrees to maintain the space respectfully and report any issues promptly. The host confirms the property is safe, habitable, and as described.
clauseCulture: Both parties agree to approach cultural differences with understanding and open communication. If something feels unclear or unusual, we talk first.
clauseCultureDe: Beide Parteien erkennen an, dass kulturelle Unterschiede in Kommunikationsstilen, Haushaltsgewohnheiten und Tagesabl√§ufen bestehen k√∂nnen. Wir verpflichten uns, Missverst√§ndnisse mit Geduld anzugehen, kl√§rende Fragen zu stellen, bevor Annahmen getroffen werden, und respektvollen Dialog √ºber Urteile zu stellen.
clauseCultureEn: Both parties acknowledge cultural differences may exist in communication styles, household customs, and daily routines. We agree to approach misunderstandings with patience, ask clarifying questions before making assumptions, and prioritize respectful dialogue over judgment.
clauseDisputes: We resolve issues in good faith. Start with a conversation, then written notice. If needed, seek local mediation resources before legal steps.
clauseDisputesDe: Streitigkeiten werden in gutem Glauben gel√∂st durch: 1) Direktes Gespr√§ch zur Kl√§rung des Problems, 2) Schriftliche Mitteilung bei Nichtl√∂sung mit Beschreibung des Problems und L√∂sungsvorschlag, 3) Mediation durch lokale Mieterberatung oder Gemeinschaftsressourcen bei Bedarf. Rechtliche Schritte sind letztes Mittel. Beide Parteien verpflichten sich, Kommunikation zu dokumentieren und ehrlich sowie fair zu handeln.
clauseDisputesEn: Disputes are resolved in good faith through: 1) Direct conversation to clarify the issue, 2) Written notice if unresolved, describing the problem and proposed solution, 3) Mediation through local tenant advocacy or community resources if necessary. Legal action is a last resort. Both parties agree to document communications and act with honesty and fairness.
clauseHouseRules: Quiet hours, shared areas, guests, smoking, pets, and local registration if needed. Rules are reasonable, clear, and communicated before signing.
clauseHouseRulesDe: Hausordnung umfasst: Ruhezeiten ([QuietStart]‚Äì[QuietEnd]), Richtlinien zu G√§sten/Besuchern, Rauchverbote, Haustiererlaubnis, Nutzung gemeinsamer R√§ume (K√ºche, Waschk√ºche) und lokale Meldepflichten (Anmeldung, empadronamiento usw.). Regeln m√ºssen angemessen, vor Unterzeichnung schriftlich kommuniziert und mit lokalen Mieterrechten vereinbar sein.
clauseHouseRulesEn: House rules include: quiet hours ([QuietStart]‚Äì[QuietEnd]), policies on guests/visitors, smoking restrictions, pet permissions, use of shared spaces (kitchen, laundry), and any local registration requirements (Anmeldung, empadronamiento, etc.). Rules must be reasonable, clearly communicated in writing before signing, and consistent with local tenant rights.
clauseMutualExit: If circumstances change, either party may end the stay early with respectful notice. Standard notice: [NoticeDays] days (or as required locally). Any prepaid amounts are reconciled fairly.
clauseMutualExitDe: Bei unvorhergesehenen Umst√§nden kann jede Partei den Aufenthalt mit schriftlicher Mitteilung von [NoticeDays] Tagen beenden (oder wie gesetzlich vorgeschrieben, je nachdem, was l√§nger ist). Die k√ºndigende Partei gibt eine klare Begr√ºndung an. Vorausbezahlte Miete wird fair abgerechnet: Nicht genutzte Miete wird anteilig erstattet, abz√ºglich angemessener Kosten, falls zutreffend.
clauseMutualExitEn: If unforeseen circumstances require ending the stay early, either party may terminate with written notice of [NoticeDays] days (or as required by local law, whichever is greater). The departing party provides clear reasoning. Any prepaid rent is reconciled fairly: unused rent is refunded proportionally, minus reasonable costs if applicable.
clausePayments: Rent due on [DueDay] each month via [Method]. Deposits, if any, are held for damages beyond normal wear. Provide receipts and return timely after checkout.
clausePaymentsDe: Die monatliche Miete von ‚Ç¨[Amount] ist am [DueDay] jeden Monats √ºber [Method] (Bank√ºberweisung, PayPal usw.) f√§llig. Kautionen werden, falls erforderlich, separat aufbewahrt und innerhalb von [DepositReturnDays] Tagen nach dem Auszug zur√ºckerstattet, abz√ºglich dokumentierter Abz√ºge f√ºr Sch√§den √ºber normale Abnutzung hinaus. Beide Parteien bewahren Zahlungsbelege und Schadensbeweise auf.
clausePaymentsEn: Monthly rent of ‚Ç¨[Amount] is due on the [DueDay] of each month via [Method] (bank transfer, PayPal, etc.). Security deposits, if required, are held separately and returned within [DepositReturnDays] days after checkout, minus documented deductions for damages beyond normal wear. Both parties retain payment receipts and damage evidence.

countryNotes: Deposit limits, notice periods, and registration rules differ by country and city. Before signing, check local requirements and update placeholders like [NoticeDays], [DueDay], and [Method].
countryNotesDe: Rechtliche Anforderungen variieren je nach Land und Stadt. Deutschland: Max. 3 Monatsmieten Kaution, Anmeldung erforderlich. √ñsterreich: Kautionen reguliert, Anmeldung verpflichtend. Spanien: Empadronamiento m√∂glicherweise erforderlich. Frankreich: K√ºndigungsfristen gesetzlich gesch√ºtzt. √úberpr√ºfen Sie immer lokale Mieterrechte, Kautionsgrenzen ([MaxKaution] Monatsmieten), Meldepflicht und Mindestk√ºndigungsfristen ([MinK√ºndigungstage] Tage) vor Unterzeichnung. Platzhalter an lokales Recht anpassen.
countryNotesEn: Legal requirements vary by country and city. Germany: Max 3 months rent deposit, Anmeldung required. Austria: Deposits regulated, registration mandatory. Spain: Empadronamiento may be needed. France: Notice periods protected by law. Always verify local tenant rights, deposit limits ([MaxDeposit] months rent), mandatory registration, and minimum notice periods ([MinNoticeDays] days) before signing. Update placeholders to reflect local law.
createYourFirst: Create your first listing to get started!
ctaHeroDesc: Join thousands of travelers and hosts connecting through meaningful seasonal experiences
ctaHeroTitle: Ready to Find Your Next Adventure?
diffFeesBody: You negotiate directly with owners and employers. No middlemen. No hidden commissions. What you agree to is what you pay.
diffHandshakeBody: 6-12 month leases with real people. No corporate landlords, no forced contracts. Just you and them, working it out.
diffTravelBody: Live your dream. Work in Innsbruck for the ski season. Live in Barcelona for the summer. Stay as long as you want, move freely.
diffVerifiedBody: ID and phone verification mean real accountability. Scammers get filtered out. Trust is earned, not faked.
documentSubmittedSuccess: {{type}} documents submitted successfully! They will be reviewed shortly.
emptyJobsDesc: We're in early stages and looking for employers. Post your opportunity today and be featured as one of our founding partners. Help build the future of seasonal hiring.
emptyStaysDesc: We're in early stages and looking for hosts. List your space today and be featured as one of our founding members. Help build the future of seasonal living.
emptyThread: No messages yet. Start by asking a question about this opportunity.
enterEmailForReset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link
enterSmsCodePhone: Enter the SMS code sent to {{phone}}
enterValidPhoneE164: Please enter a valid phone number with country code (e.g., +1234567890)
failedToLoadProfile: Unable to load this profile. Please try again.
faq1A: Sign up for any paid plan and add your payment details. You get full access for 90 days completely free. Cancel anytime before the trial ends with no charges.
faq1Q: How does the 90-day free trial work?
faq2A: Basic (free) users need email verification. Paid plans require phone verification for messaging. ID verification is optional but builds trust and unlocks premium features.
faq2Q: What verification levels do I need?
faq3A: Create a free account, go to "List Your Place", fill in details about your accommodation or job opportunity, and publish. Lister plan unlocks unlimited listings.
faq3Q: How do I list my property or job?
faq4A: No booking fees! We only charge subscription fees. Connect directly with hosts or employers without hidden transaction costs.
faq5A: Phone-verified users can send unlimited messages. Conversations are private and secure. We never share your contact details without permission.
faq6A: Both parties can access our mediation service. Agreements are stored on the platform. We review evidence and help find fair resolutions.
faq6Q: What if I have a dispute?
faq7A: Yes! Cancel anytime from your profile settings. You keep access until the end of your billing period. No cancellation fees.
faq7Q: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq8A: Yes! Our platform supports English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, and Portuguese. Switch languages from the top menu.
faqContactText: Still have questions? Our support team is here to help.
faqSectionDesc: Everything you need to know about seasonal work and stays
featureAgreementsDesc: Dual-language agreements with digital signatures protect both parties.
featureCommunicationDesc: Connect worldwide. Real-time translation removes language barriers.
featureMessagingDesc: Encrypted messaging ensures your conversations stay private and secure.
featureReputationDesc: Every interaction builds reputation. Users with excellent ratings stand out.
featureSafetyDesc: Reporting, blocking, and guidelines create a safe space for everyone.
featureSectionDesc: Connecting travelers and hosts through trust and transparency
featureVerifiedUsersDesc: Every user is verified through email, phone, and optional ID.
fightAlgoProblem: Platforms force communities. You find random strangers, not people like you.
fightAlgoSolution: YOU choose who you connect with. Direct messaging. Real conversations.
fightContractsProblem: Legal jargon and surprise fees. Unclear what you're actually paying for.
fightContractsSolution: Simple, clear agreements between two people. A handshake, but digital.
fightCorpProblem: Middlemen taking 20-30% commissions. Massive fees that inflate prices.
fightCorpSolution: Direct connections. You keep 100% of the negotiation power.
fightScamProblem: Unverified accounts and elaborate scams. You never know who's real.
fightScamSolution: ID verification. Real people with real trust scores. Accountability matters.
flatsharesEmptyDesc: We're building the community for seasonal flatshares. List your place now and help other travelers find their perfect home away from home.
flatsharesEmptyTitle: Be the First to List a Flatshare!
flatsharesSubtitle: Find your next shared apartment with compatible roommates
footerBrandMotto: Helping travelers and hosts connect globally.
founderQuote: you guys remind us of our own sons, and we want to help you out.
founderQuoteAttribution: An Austrian family ‚Äî the moment Seasoners was born
freeTrialBanner: ‚ú® 90-day free trial on all paid plans when you add payment details
freeTrialExplainer: Card required, no charge until day 91. Cancel anytime before trial ends.
helpAccountA1: Click 'Forgot Password' on the sign-in page. Enter your email address and we'll send you a secure reset link. If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, check your spam folder.
helpAccountA2: Go to your Profile page and click 'Edit Profile'. You can update your name, bio, location, languages, and profile picture. Remember to click 'Save Changes' when you're done.
helpAccountA3: After signing up, check your email for a verification link. Click the link to verify your email. If you didn't receive it, go to your profile and click 'Resend Verification Email'.
helpAccountA4: Go to your Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Phone Verification. Enter your phone number and click 'Send Code'. Enter the 6-digit code you receive via SMS to complete verification.
helpAccountQ1: How do I reset my password?
helpAccountQ2: How do I update my profile information?
helpAccountQ3: How do I verify my email address?
helpAccountQ4: How do I verify my phone number?
helpAccountSubtitle: Manage your account, security, and verification
helpListingsA1: Listings may be rejected for: incomplete information, inappropriate content, fake photos, discriminatory language, or violating our Terms of Service. Check your email for specific feedback from our moderation team.
helpListingsA2: Go to your Profile ‚Üí My Listings. Click on the listing you want to edit, then click 'Edit'. Make your changes and click 'Save'. Changes are reviewed before going live.
helpListingsQ2: How do I edit my listing?
helpListingsSubtitle: Create, manage, and optimize your listings
helpListingsTip2: Be specific about dates and requirements
helpNeedMoreHelp: Need more help with your listing?
helpPaymentsA1: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), as well as various local payment methods through Stripe. All payments are processed securely.
helpPaymentsA2: A card is required to start your 90-day free trial. You won't be charged until the trial ends. If you subscribe monthly, you'll be charged on day 91 and then on the same day each month. Annual subscriptions are charged once per year.
helpPaymentsA3: You can cancel anytime during your 90-day free trial at no cost. After billing starts, subscriptions are non-refundable for the current billing period, but you can cancel to prevent future charges.
helpPaymentsA4: Go to Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Subscription ‚Üí Update Payment Method. Enter your new card details. Your next payment will use the updated method.
helpPaymentsContactBilling: Contact our billing team for personalized assistance
helpPaymentsQ1: What payment methods do you accept?
helpPaymentsQ2: When will I be charged for my subscription?
helpPaymentsQ4: How do I update my payment method?
helpPaymentsSecureDesc: All payments are processed securely through Stripe. We never store your complete credit card information.
helpSafetyBeforeTip1: Always communicate through Seasoners messaging until you're comfortable
helpSafetyBeforeTip2: Video chat before meeting in person to verify identity
helpSafetyDuringTip1: Keep important documents and valuables secure
helpSafetyDuringTip2: Share your location with trusted friends or family
helpSafetyEmergencyNote: For life-threatening emergencies, always contact local authorities first
helpSafetyPrivacyTip1: Don't share your full address in your listing description
helpSafetyPrivacyTip2: Use Seasoners messaging instead of personal email or phone initially
helpSafetyReportDesc: Report safety issues immediately - we take every report seriously
helpSafetyScamsTip1: Never send money outside of official payment channels
helpSafetyScamsTip2: Be suspicious of deals that seem too good to be true
heroSubtitle: We verify people, agreements, and pay so seasonal workers, hosts, and employers connect safely across borders. One platform for trusted stays and fair jobs.

hpWhyTitle: Built on Trust. Backed by Transparency.
jobsSubtitle: Hospitality, mountain ops, retail & trades. Hire fast, work the season.

pillarConnectionBody: Every stay and job posting represents a relationship, not a reservation number. We prioritize genuine human interactions over transactional exchanges.
pillarCultureBody: We facilitate meaningful cross-cultural exchange by providing context, fostering curiosity, and celebrating diversity. Understanding bridges divides.
pillarFairnessBody: Plain-language agreements, clear expectations, and mutual respect replace hidden fees and opaque policies. Trust is built through transparency.

premiumIDEarlyBird: Early Bird Special: First 1,000 users get lifetime free ID verification!

safetyDisputeDesc: If something goes wrong, we have processes to help. Direct support and fair resolution between parties.
safetyPrincipleText: Simple principles: Direct connections YES. Zero legal protection NO. We keep it simple but we keep you safe.
safetySubtitle: Simple doesn't mean unprotected. We believe in direct connections WITH legal safeguards.
safetyTermsDesc: Legal protections are built in. You have clear T&Cs and privacy rights that protect you.
safetyVerifiedDesc: ID and phone verification for every user. No anonymity. Real accountability. Real safety.

stepAgreeBody: Talk it through. Agree on terms together. Simple, clear, done. No lawyers, no fees, no corporate middlemen.
stepCreateBody: Verify who you are. Build your real identity and trust score. Make an actual connection with hosts.
stepFindBody: Browse stays, jobs, and people looking for seasonal help. Message directly. No algorithms. No bots. Real conversations.
